overview: "Come to the church in the wildwood"---even if you live in town! Filmed at the Billy Graham Chapel, this DVD features the immortal sounds of the Goodmans, Jake Hess, Hovie Lister, and others. Includes "Just a Closer Walk with Thee," "Keep on the Sunny Side," "Revive Us Again," "We'll Soon Be Done with Troubles and Trials," and more.
title: Church in the Wildwood
